description: The #1 SvelteKit boilerplate with all you need to build and launch fast!
title: Ship your SvelteKit App, Set Sail! | SvelteShip
introduction: SvelteShip is the #1 SvelteKit boilerplate designed to help you build and launch your projects quickly. It includes pre-built UI components, user authentication powered by Supabase, Stripe integration for payments, Mailgun integration for emails, and more. With SvelteShip, you can focus on your app and let the boilerplate handle the repetitive tasks.
features: Full Stack integration with SvelteKit, Tailwind, DaisyUI, Supabase, and Mailgun
Developer Experience enhancements like linting and testing
targetPeople: Developers looking to quickly launch SvelteKit projects

faqs.question: What is included in the plan?
faqs.answer: The plan includes Sveltekit Boilerplate, Pre-Built UI Components, Supabase Auth + DB Integration, Stripe Integration, Mailgun Email Integration, Hotswap Styling, Documentation & Tutorials, and Lifetime Updates.
